mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_YSZX_IDEA ( UUID, APPLY_DEPT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CONTACT_USER, CONTACT_PHONE, VISIT_UNIT_TYPE, VISIT_UNIT_NAME, VISITOR_NUMBER, COMPANY_USER_NUMBER, REMARK, STATUS, APPLY_ID, VISIT_LEVEL, VALID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NUMBER, APPLY_ORDER, APPLY_YEAR ) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{stateDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{contactUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitUnitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitorNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{companyUserNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyOrder,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{applyYear,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_YSZX_IDEA SET APPLY_DEPT =#{applyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE =to_date(#{stateDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), END_DATE =to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), CONTACT_USER =#{contactUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE =#{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_UNIT_TYPE =#{visitUnitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_UNIT_NAME =#{visitUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISITOR_NUMBER =#{visitorNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, COMPANY_USER_NUMBER=#{companyUserNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REMARK= #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_LEVEL =#{visitLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE UUID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID='1'
UPDATE TB_YSZX_IDEA SET STATUS =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE UUID=#{ideaId} and VALID='1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_YSZX_VISIT ( UUID, IDEAID, USERNAME, POSITION, USERLEVEL, SORT_ID, REMARK, VALID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ideaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_YSZX_VISIT SET USERNAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION=#{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERLEVEL=#{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT_ID=#{sortId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE UUID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IDEAID =#{ideaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID='1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_YSZX_COMPANY_LEADER ( UUID, IDEAID, USERID, REMARK, VALID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ideaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO TB_YSZX_COMPANY_USER ( UUID, IDEAID, USERID, REMARK, VALID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ideaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME,USERALIAS,HRDEPTNAME,HRDEPTCODE,POSTCODE,POSTNAME FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE SRC = 0 AND STATE = 1 AND USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT APPLY_NUMBER, TO_CHAR( START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR( END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA WHERE VALID = '1'
and UUID != #{idea}
SELECT ID AS USERID, USERALISA FROM TB_YSZX_CONFIG_COMPANY_LEADER WHERE VALID = '1'

SELECT APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", APPLY_ORDER as "applyOrder", APPLY_YEAR as "applyYear" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA WHERE VALID = '1'
and APPLY_YEAR like '%'||#{applyYear}||'%'
ORDER BY APPLY_ORDER DESC

SELECT T.* from( SELECT TB.* , ROWNUM AS ROWNO from( SELECT UUID as "id", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code=STATUS) as "status", STATUS as "approveState", APPLY_ID as "applyId", APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", VALID as "valId", CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA WHERE VALID = '1'
and APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyId}||'%'
and TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM') like '%'||#{createTime}||'%'
and APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC ) TB WHERE #{page_end} >= ROWNUM ) T WHERE T.ROWNO > #{page_start}

SELECT UUID as "visitId" , IDEAID as "ideaId", USERNAME as "userName", POSITION as "position" , USERLEVEL as "userLevel", SORT_ID as "sortId" , REMARK as "remark", CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "createTime" FROM TB_YSZX_VISIT WHERE VALID = '1'
and IDEAID like '%'||#{ideaId}||'%'
ORDER BY SORT_ID

SELECT T.UUID as "leaderId", T.IDEAID as "ideaId", T.USERID as "userId", T.REMARK as "remark", T.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "createTime", U.USERALISA as "userAlisa", U.DEPTNAME as "deptName", U.SORTID as "sortId" FROM TB_YSZX_COMPANY_LEADER T LEFT JOIN TB_YSZX_CONFIG_COMPANY_LEADER U ON T.USERID = U.ID WHERE T.VALID = '1'
and T.IDEAID like '%'||#{ideaId}||'%'
and T.USERID like '%'||#{userId}||'%'
ORDER BY U.SORTID

SELECT T.UUID as "companyId", T.IDEAID as "ideaId", T.USERID as "userId", T.REMARK as "remark", T.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "createTime", U.USERALIAS as "userAlisa", U.POSTNAME as "postName" FROM TB_YSZX_COMPANY_USER T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON T.USERID = U.USERID WHERE T.VALID = '1'
and T.IDEAID like '%'||#{ideaId}||'%'
and T.USERID like '%'||#{userId}||'%'

SELECT UUID as "id", APPLY_DEPT as "applyDeptId", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code=STATUS) as "status", STATUS as "approveState", APPLY_ID as "applyId", VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", VALID as "valId", CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime", APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA WHERE VALID = '1'
and UUID like '%'||#{id}||'%'

SELECT USERID as "userId", USERNAME as "userName", USERALIAS as "userAlias", HRDEPTNAME as "hrDeptName", HRDEPTCODE as "hrDeptCode", POSTCODE as "postCode", POSTNAME as "postName" FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE SRC = 0 AND USERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT T.* from( SELECT TB.* , ROWNUM AS ROWNO from( SELECT G.UUID as "id", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code= G.STATUS) as "status", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" , D.APPROVE_NODE as "approveNode", D.ID as "wlApproveId" , E.APPROVE_USER as "approveUserId" from TB_YSZX_IDEA G LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE D ON G.APPLY_ID=D.APPLY_ID AND D.VALID='1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER E ON D.ID=E.APPROVE_ID AND E.VALID='1' where G.VALID='1' and G.APPLY_ID is not null AND D.APPROVE_STATUS='0' AND D.AUDIT_FLAG='1'
and E.APPROVE_USER like '%'||#{approveUserId}||'%'
and G.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUserName}||'%'
and G.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
ORDER BY G.CREATE_TIME DESC ) TB WHERE #{page_end} >= ROWNUM ) T WHERE T.ROWNO > #{page_start}

SELECT T.* from( SELECT TB.* , ROWNUM AS ROWNO from( SELECT G.UUID as "id", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code= G.STATUS) as "status", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" , D.APPROVE_NODE as "approveNode", D.ID as "wlApproveId" , E.APPROVE_USER as "approveUserId" from TB_YSZX_IDEA G LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE D ON G.APPLY_ID=D.APPLY_ID AND D.VALID='1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER E ON D.ID=E.APPROVE_ID AND E.VALID='1' where G.VALID='1' and G.APPLY_ID is not null AND D.APPROVE_STATUS='1' AND D.AUDIT_FLAG='1' AND D.ID IS NOT NULL
and E.APPROVE_USER like '%'||#{approveUserId}||'%'
and G.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUserName}||'%'
and G.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
ORDER BY G.CREATE_TIME DESC ) TB WHERE #{page_end} >= ROWNUM ) T WHERE T.ROWNO > #{page_start}

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT G.UUID as "id", ( SELECT wm_concat( D.USERALISA) from TB_YSZX_COMPANY_LEADER T LEFT JOIN TB_YSZX_CONFIG_COMPANY_LEADER D ON T.USERID =D.ID where T.VALID='1' AND D.VALID='1' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "leaderInfo", ( SELECT wm_concat( D.USERALIAS||'('||D.POSTNAME ||')') from TB_YSZX_COMPANY_USER T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER D ON T.USERID =D.USERID where T.VALID='1' AND D.VALID='1' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "userInfo", ( SELECT wm_concat(T.USERNAME||'('|| T.POSITION ||'、'||D.NAME||')') FROM TB_YSZX_VISIT T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY D ON T.USERLEVEL =D.CODE where T.VALID='1' AND D.VAILD='1' AND D.PCODE='visitunit_levle' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "visitInfo", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code=G.STATUS) as "status", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA G WHERE G.VALID = '1' ) where 1=1
and "applyNumber" like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and "createTime" like '%'||#{year}||'%'
and "createTime" like '%'||#{month}||'%'
and "applyDept" like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
and "visitInfo" like '%'||#{visitName}||'%'
and "visitInfo" like '%'||#{visitLevel}||'%'
and "id" IN
${item}

SELECT DISTINCT( T.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDeptID", D.DEPTNAME as "applyDeptName", D.PDEPTCODE as "pdeptCode", D.PDEPTNAME as "pdeptName" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON T.APPLY_DEPT =D.DEPTID WHERE T.VALID='1' AND D.VALID='1'
SELECT APPLY_STATUS FROM TB_WL_APPLY WHERE VALID='1' and ID=#{id}

SELECT T.NODE, G.ROLE_NAME, G.ROLE_CODE, G.ID FROM TB_WL_RULE T LEFT JOIN TB_PRIV_ROLE G ON T.APPROVE_ROLE=G.ID where G.VALID='1' AND T.VALID ='1' AND T.APPROVE_ROLE IS not NULL AND T.NODE=#{applyStatus}
